short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Target searches + top voices and automatically comment their posts with AI to boost your reach on LinkedIn and Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PowerIn is a tool for posting AI-generated comments automatically under any person's posts or on posts containing specific keywords or hashtags,  on LinkedIn and Twitter
- 


PowerIn automatically comments on up to 200 targeted LinkedIn and X posts per day that are relevant for you, or your business, ALL by powered by AI. You can target specific creators, or keywords!

The best part? The comments sound even more human than what we might write ourselves, thanks to the personalized tone!

It's a fantastic way to spark initial interactions with relevant people and grow your audience quickly and organically. Plus, it works for both Twitter and LinkedIn!

Want to see how PowerIn works? We made many tutorial ðŸŽ¥
